comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Be thankful you have your health.  Think of all the thousands of people in your situation that may be worse off due to physical or mental issues.  Now is the time to surround yourself with RL friends, not forum contacts.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: i’ve been in constant bad luck since even before the pandemic started i’ve felt like my life gave me nothing but problems and it always kept coming i would always pray and hope for the better times but i felt like nothing was improving and even becoming worse i always worried if i could survive the next month because i know a month wouldn’t pass where no new problem would emerge even until now i worry how i’m going to financially survive the next year right now i know that all i have to do is try my best and don’t let the problems take me down too much

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: In all of the misfortune things that happens to us, let's look at the brighter side that we're still here alive and kicking. I know that it's hard to talk to someone like you OP while dealing that tough situation that you are.There's still hope and things are going to be better, it may not be this time or soonest but the time will come that all of these sufferings and unfortune things happened to you will turn into a positive one. You have a purpose while you're still here and as they say, everything has a reason why it happens. You're a tough guy and you'll recover from this hard situation.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: There is still a Air in your lungs meaning you are breathing and with that you must be thankful mate.don't count the Bad luck but count how you survived all of that and now still alive and kicking , you have posted the longest personal post I have ever read and indeed that is such a story .but remember that as long as we are alive , there is still a chance and never forget that everyone has their chances , so try your best still and trust me your time will come as long as you are not taking advantage of others and doing the best for everything.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: I only read the first line and skipped the remaining because everyone have their own stories like this and I can write a longer one than this but this can be only changed if we make the move to make it better financially, mentally and physically and don't expect that life to be so smooth and just goes on a straight line, it will be filled with ups and downs and curves and corners, path holes, rough, etc.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Quote from: ineedhelpplease on December 16, 2023, 02:03:36 AMI'm honestly just quite wondering has anyone else here ever experienced a horrible year where they had to go through tons of bad luck and how they handled it.Well, I have had a bad year since September 2022 when I had a terrible accident where I lost 3 of my teeth and I used all my savings for treatments after which it took me sometimes to recover and ever since I had that accident it's been from one problem to another till I left my location and traveled to meet my uncle in the city, so in the city I met a friend who introduced me to this bitcointalk forum so i joined and since then i have experienced some changes in my lifestyle and the way i relate with people as this forum have really became my second home so i come here anytime i like and go anytime i like so being on this forum has really been the best thing that has happened to me this year and i am glad to be a part of this family (bitcointalk).

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Sad  to see you happened to experienced those mate but I think you are still lucky for having a chance to come back , I mean you have family and friends that will be with you all these fights.just believe that everything in life is temporary so you could have a life back in the coming years .

comments.author: Natsuu
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on December 16, 2023, 02:52:53 AMBe thankful you have your health.  Think of all the thousands of people in your situation that may be worse off due to physical or mental issues.  Now is the time to surround yourself with RL friends, not forum contacts.  You cant just shrug off someone’s struggle by telling them to compare their situation to others. Just because others experience worse does nit mean that OP doesnt have the right to feel bad for theirselves. Each person's struggle is valid and it's important to acknowledge and address their feelings without comparing them to others. We have experiences and challenges that are unique. Salute to us having our bad years and still starts a new year better!

comments.body: Last year 2023 was the worst time of my life because in this year I earned a lot of money in my life and I couldn't keep those money properly because I lost in different places so I must take care like this year is new for me.  Of course we have to do this work so that we can start, we have to forget everything behind
